name: The Zomb Ghosts
description:
Welcome to the zombghosts! There are over 31 upgrade levels!

Under here is some stuff too help like controls and goals and stuff.

Download the game or play it in the browser.
Controls

ASWD/Left Right Up down keys to move.

ESC to pause and get upgrades (make sure to press the mouse button to get back into the game).

Mouse Button 1/Left Mouse button to shoot.

Scraped Controls (These controls work but not reccomended)

Space to Dash.

Goal

Get as many points as you can as you avoid zombie ghosts while upgrading.

If you hit an enemy you get 1 point and based on the typed you get more points on its death.

Die and you lose your points.

Enemy Types

Basic:1-3 health and 3 points on death

Gold:3-6 health and 4 points on death

Darren:6-9 health and 5 points on death

Golden Darren:8-13 health and 7 points on death

I hope you enjoy the game!
